name: climb a ladder into the ocean
name_original: climb a ladder into the ocean
description:
a short and uneventful adventure into the ocean

made during ludum dare 48

known bug: if the camera drifts upwards, try unplugging the controller and restarting the game

controls:

  • Move: WASD, Arrow keys, or Gamepad left stick
  • Look: Mouse or Gamepad right stick
  • Jump: Space or Gamepad A button
  • Fullscreen: F11 or Alt-Enter
  • Quit: Hold Escape or Gamepad Start

3rd-party credits:

  • freesound: amholma, vhschool2019, eelke, lukeo135, sheyvan, masterengine, josepharaoh99
  • guy: i bought the rights to this stock photo guy a while ago and I'm gonna use it
  • font: Mansalva
